title: The Call
coreTruth: You didn't come here to fit in. You came here to build the place where you belong.

signal.title: The Beacon
signal.content: A single spark in the void finding another. Voiceover: 'What if you aren't lost? What if you are just early?'

academy.title: The Trailblazer's Paradox
academy.content: Isolation isn't a punishment; it's a quarantine. You are broadcasting on a frequency the old world can't receive yet.

guild.title: The Beacon Check
guild.objective: Stop seeking validation. Start signaling identity.
steps: Do one thing that is purely YOU.
Observe who leans in and who leans away.
